statements: UPDATE quantum_circuits SET optimization_strategy = 'QAOA' WHERE circuit_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
UPDATE quantum_circuits SET design = 'Grover' WHERE circuit_name = 'Superposition'
UPDATE quantum_circuits SET optimization_strategy = 'Simulated Annealing', design = 'XYZ' WHERE circuit_id = 'a1b2c3';
UPDATE quantum_circuits SET circuit_name = 'Bell State', optimization_strategy = 'Grover Algorithm' WHERE circuit_id = 'd4e5f6';
UPDATE quantum_circuits SET qubits_used = 3, operations = 'Hadamard, CNOT' WHERE circuit_id = 1;
UPDATE optimization_strategies SET optimization_steps = 5, optimization_details = '{"type": "Greedy", "threshold": 0.5}' WHERE strategy_id = 2;
UPDATE quantum_circuits SET circuit_name = 'Modified Circuit', qubits_used = 10 WHERE circuit_id = 1;
UPDATE optimization_strategies SET optimization_steps = 5, optimization_details = '{"type": "Greedy Algorithm", "iterations": 10}' WHERE strategy_name = 'Strategy A';
UPDATE quantum_circuits SET circuit_name = 'Quantum Algorithm A', circuit_description = 'Optimized for Machine Learning' WHERE circuit_id = '5ef3b74a-c815-4993-a777-763d0f8d57d2';
UPDATE hardware_devices SET device_name = 'Quantum Computer A', device_type = 'Quantum' WHERE device_id = '06927a2c-95eb-4bc4-aa77-8423c938e302';
UPDATE quantum_circuits SET circuit_name = 'Superposition Circuit', circuit_description = 'Circuit demonstrating superposition of qubits' WHERE circuit_id = '2f9ec4fd-3455-4e5c-b25e-11a2f5d27274';
UPDATE hardware_devices SET device_type = 'Quantum', device_description = 'State-of-the-art quantum device for quantum computing' WHERE device_id = '0cc72c9e-72e0-43d1-8a9b-c5e3c14b3442';
UPDATE quantum_circuits SET circuit_description = 'Updated description' WHERE circuit_id = 1;
UPDATE optimization_strategies SET strategy_description = 'New strategy' WHERE strategy_id = 2;
UPDATE quantum_circuits SET circuit_description = 'Updated description' WHERE circuit_name = 'Example Circuit'
UPDATE optimization_strategies SET strategy_description = 'New strategy description' WHERE strategy_id = 3
UPDATE quantum_circuits SET circuit_name = 'Updated Quantum Circuit' WHERE circuit_id = 1;
UPDATE optimization_strategies SET optimization_steps = '["Step A", "Step B", "Step C"]' WHERE strategy_id = 3;
UPDATE quantum_circuits SET circuit_name = 'New Circuit Name', modified_at = NOW() WHERE circuit_id = 1;
UPDATE hardware_configurations SET qubit_count = qubit_count + 1, modified_at = NOW() WHERE configuration_id = 2;
